name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 1, a knife attack occurred at a daycare center in Zurich, Switzerland. A local police spokesman said that a 23-year-old Chinese man attacked three children at the daycare center, one of whom was seriously injured. A nursery staff member and a bystander successfully subdued the murderer until the police arrived.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1, Taipei, Taiwan. The anti-National Day activities of Hong Kong people in Taiwan were disrupted by Chinese tourists, who shouted: Taiwan and Hong Kong are both Chinese. One of the organizers of the event went to Tang and said: Those who do not agree with freedom and democracy should go back to China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1, Xiangyang, Hubei. Two women took photos in kimonos and were watched and criticized by citizens: "Do you know that today is the 75th anniversary of the founding of New China? Aren't you afraid of being beaten for wearing kimonos on the street?" Then the two women and the photographer who accompanied them were taken away by the police. The citizens who watched applauded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"No hatred today"
On October 1, Xi Jinping and Li Qiang sent congratulatory messages to Shigeru Ishiba on his election as Prime Minister of Japan, hoping that China and Japan would maintain friendship for generations and move toward each other.
Xi Jinping pointed out that China and Japan are close neighbors. It is in the fundamental interests of the two peoples for the two countries to follow the path of peaceful coexistence, friendship for generations, mutually beneficial cooperation and common development.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 30, Guangdong. A netizen posted a video saying that a Japanese flag was posted on a resident's balcony. It was later confirmed that it was not a Japanese flag, but a "Fu" character. The netizen said that in order to avoid misunderstanding, "the neighbor had torn off the window sticker."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens counted various "loyalty" incidents that occurred this year

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 1, Iran launched a large-scale missile attack on Israel. An IDF spokesman said that no casualties had been reported so far. The media then reported the first casualty of Iran's missile attack on Israel: a Palestinian was killed by fragments of an intercepted missile in Jericho, West Bank. Iranian media said that Iran launched about 200 missiles at Israel, and 90% of the missiles successfully hit the target.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Taiwanese singer An Pu once strongly supported the Sunflower Movement and displayed the flag of the Republic of China on stage during a performance in the UK. Yesterday, she sent a handwritten letter on Weibo to wish China a happy National Day, and the posting time was 10:01 pm, which just happened to be China's National Day on October 1. This made many Chinese netizens excited, but on the other hand, many Taiwanese netizens were disappointed in her.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1 (Released) According to a Russian Telegram group, it was reported online that two Chinese mercenaries were shot dead by Ukrainian armed forces.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to Swiss media reports, the 23-year-old Chinese man who attacked children in a daycare center in Zurich was a student who planned to study for a master's degree at the University of Zurich. Before the attack, he had made patriotic remarks on social media, expressing his love for the motherland and the party.
Previously, a patriotic celebrity suspected that the murderer was a "white paper youth" because of the white paper on the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 1, Hua Chunying posted 18 sets of comparison pictures on X, vividly showing the changes in China over the past 75 years, but the media did not mention the publishing platform, and many netizens also asked in the comment section what platform it was posted on.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 1, NATO's new Secretary-General Mark Rutte reiterated that China has become a "decisive promoter" of Russia's war of aggression against Ukraine and that there will be a price to pay for supporting Russia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The recently released "China Catering Brand Power White Paper 2024" shows that from January to August this year, the number of registered catering-related companies nationwide decreased by 444,000 compared with the same period last year, while the number of catering-related companies that were deregistered or revoked during the same period exceeded 1.6 million, exceeding 90% of the total number of deregistrations and revocations in 23 years. Not only that, per capita consumption in the main catering sectors is also showing a downward trend.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1 (Release), Jiangsu. A 91-year-old stock investor talks about the bull market surge. The old man said: The stock market still has room to rise. We have fought a trade war with the United States for six years, and we won this time. At present, the United States has two options. The first is to raise interest rates, which will accelerate the demise of the United States. The second is that the United States will start a war, but we have intercontinental missiles. Seeing that we have strong strength, the United States dare not start a war.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of September 29, at an intersection in Saitama Prefecture, Japan, an 18-year-old unemployed Chinese man who had just finished drinking drove his friend in the opposite direction on a one-way street and hit a 51-year-old company leader in Kawaguchi City, killing him. Afterwards, the driver let his friend run first and stayed behind to deal with the police. The police have changed the suspicion to suspected dangerous driving causing death and are further investigating the circumstances of the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported online that Putin recently signed a law prohibiting the conduct of a national census of Russian citizens in the next five years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 1, a netizen posted that when he submitted his resume to China Mobile, the system displayed that it “contains sensitive words” and could not be submitted because he is a member of the Communist Party.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 1, a blogger investigated the current situation of the companies and persons responsible after the "rat head and duck neck" incident. After investigation, it was found that five months after the incident, the leaders of the school involved both resigned, and the director of the local market supervision bureau has not been dealt with yet. The catering company involved in the incident, "Jiangxi Zhongkuai Logistics Service Co., Ltd.", was punished again in May this year for operating filthy and unclean food. The company was listed as a serious dishonest person after the rat head and duck neck incident, but the company can still continue to obtain the right to contract the unit canteen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1, Zhengzhou, Henan. After failing to stop a wedding car to ask for money, the elderly people directly robbed the man. One of the elderly people said to the robbed man, "You deserve it."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reported on October 1, Bengbu, Anhui. A young man jumped into the river to commit suicide. Passersby found him and called the police and threw him a life buoy. The life buoy was at hand. People on the shore kept shouting for the man to grab the life buoy, but the man turned his back and shook his head.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman in Xi'an was detained by the police for posting a video about "snowing in Xi'an" online. A blogger said: A netizen was detained for saying that it snowed in Xi'an, but those bragging videos are popular and nothing happened.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The social account of Fan Yuhao, a 23-year-old Chinese man who attacked three children with a knife in Zurich.
Fan is studying digital linguistics at the University of Zurich.
In a post titled "Celebrating National Day" the day before, he used a long article to describe his sexual fantasies about a league secretary at Southwest University, as well as a large number of patriotic pictures.
In another post, he was angry that the school and the Taiwan Embassy jointly organized a lecture on Taiwan's sovereignty.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Email from the President of the University of Zurich

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 2, the United States broke with tradition and has not yet officially sent a congratulatory message to China on its National Day. However, Russian President Vladimir Putin and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un both sent congratulatory messages to Xi Jinping on Tuesday, congratulating the 75th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Discussion in the Zurich University student group

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guangdong, a man posted a video saying that if all Chinese people stop buying Japanese products for a month, thousands of Japanese companies will go bankrupt and half of the people in Japan will be unemployed. If all Chinese people stop buying Japanese products for a year, Japan's economic structure will completely collapse. Many netizens expressed their support in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 1 (Release) Binzhou, Shandong. Jianghaihui's salesperson absorbed a large amount of deposits and then collapsed. Investors held up Mao Zedong's portrait in front of the government building to defend their rights.
October 1, Zhumadian, Henan. Pengyu City was left unfinished. Owners held up banners and waved national flags to protest and defend their rights.
October 2, Wuhan, Hubei. Xingguang Yaozun was left unfinished. Owners defended their rights. During this period, many owners were taken to buses by the police.
October 1, Linyi, Shandong. A group of veterans held banners in front of the construction site to demand wages and defend their rights.
